about_the_game:
You are Maxim, an ordinary student from Pavlodar, who has been suffering from nightmares since childhood.

Lately they have been creeping into reality more and more often, driving you crazy!
The situation worsens when your own father disappears without leaving a trace.

Now it's up to you to look for him, unraveling the mystical secrets of your own past along the way.





Dashingly twisted detective plot will let you plunge into the mystical secrets of the past and the dark corners of the protagonist’s mind.
Your phone and other interactive objects encountered throughout the game will help you along the way!



In our psychological horror, you will encounter a lot of unexplained phenomena that will chill your bones.
Advanced graphics and photogrammetry will help you achieve great immersion.



While investigating the crimes, you will repeatably stumble upon puzzles.
Solving these will open locked doors and also shed light on the events happening around you.
Be careful, because some of them hide secrets not many are able to find!



Enemies never sleep! Hide in shelters and don't let them to see you, even those who don't have eyes!
Our game is full of different enemies! Can you outwit them all?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore

About the Game


You are Maxim, an ordinary student from Pavlodar, who has been suffering from nightmares since childhood.

Lately they have been creeping into reality more and more often, driving you crazy!
The situation worsens when your own father disappears without leaving a trace.

Now it's up to you to look for him, unraveling the mystical secrets of your own past along the way.





Dashingly twisted detective plot will let you plunge into the mystical secrets of the past and the dark corners of the protagonist’s mind.
Your phone and other interactive objects encountered throughout the game will help you along the way!



In our psychological horror, you will encounter a lot of unexplained phenomena that will chill your bones.
Advanced graphics and photogrammetry will help you achieve great immersion.



While investigating the crimes, you will repeatably stumble upon puzzles.
Solving these will open locked doors and also shed light on the events happening around you.
Be careful, because some of them hide secrets not many are able to find!



Enemies never sleep! Hide in shelters and don't let them to see you, even those who don't have eyes!
Our game is full of different enemies! Can you outwit them all?
name: HELP ME!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 (2.8 GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 7 1800X (3.6 GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 OR AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: system requirements may change during development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 (2.8 GHz) OR AMD Ryzen 7 1800X (3.6 GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 OR AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: system requirements may change during development of the game.

short_description: Help me! This is a story-driven first-person horror game where you are going to unravel family secrets as you move between reality and nightmares.
